message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $12,000 to you. Considering its high worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $10,800. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $1,200 compared to the market value. I trust this offer will make the acquisition process more favorable for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.
